conversion_verification.notes: Successful volumetric 3D transformation with clear wall thickness and isometric projection.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent geometry; walls show clear top and side faces. Projection is consistent.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly accurate layout fidelity. All rooms, including the small servant room and utility balcony, are present and correctly positioned.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is nearly 1:1 with the original plan, including specific chair counts and bedside tables.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with no UI text. Slight softness in edges but overall high clarity.

detected_errors.description: Some window openings on the right-side bedrooms are represented as glass walls rather than punch-hole windows.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that maintains exact spatial relationships and furniture layout from the original architectural drawing.
